# medium

**Type Property**

The system detent for a sheet that’s approximately half the height of the screen, and is inactive in compact height.

## Declaration

```swift
static let medium: PresentationDetent
```

## Getting built-in detents

- **large**: The system detent for a sheet at full height.

items.description: The system detent for a sheet at full height.
items.name: large

title: medium
